header.title: Colorization
header.body: Upload a png or jpg image to and see it colorized. If you have a short BW film (< 3mb) You can colorize it too

instructions.title: How To
instructions.body: Click the begin button below to get started with uploading your image or video

uploader.title: Upload
uploader.body:
click the button to upload your image or video.
Click the image to download.
